Text:
Classification: Game Show
Genre: Celebrities | Comedy | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)

A Short History of Everything Else is a comedy panel show which uses archive television clips to challenge players to give A Short History of Everything Else. The show is hosted by Griff Rhys Jones and he is joined by the two regular team captains, Marcus Brigstocke and Charlie Baker and different celebrity guests each week.


(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31815)
